Articles.Content:
Who is the manufacturer of the new sp+ parts? "Porkjet Aerospace"? Does his company get its own logo and offer contracts? Or are his parts added to an already existing company like "C7 Aerospace Division"

I was just wondering. If anyone could link me to a media team video where we see the parts in the VAB that would be much appreciated.

Maybe Jeb's Junkyard... building planes with all the latest...junk!

Where will you crash today?
It's C7, I watched it on a video (HOCGaming I think)

They're attributed to C7 Aerospace Division.

You can get a quick glimpse when Harv selects the parts at around 40 seconds.

Sorry if this is a bit off topic for this thread, but has there been any word on what changes they are making to the SP+ parts? Will they have significantly changed the mass and drag or will it be just minor tweaks? I do hope they haven't been changed to much!

Sorry if this is a bit off topic for this thread, but has there been any word on what changes they are making to the SP+ parts? Will they have significantly changed the mass and drag or will it be just minor tweaks? I do hope they haven't been changed to much!

Well, the twitch and youtubers kind of move too fast to really tell. I think your gonna have to wait on that. I wouldn't be surprised by some balancing but I don't expect them to be massive. I did see that the Mk2 -> Mk1 adapter has oxidizer now in one of the streams.
And the new SP+ command pods have lift now too so lifting bodies are possible without lots of clipped wing surfaces. Like my stock Dreamchaser.

Well, the twitch and youtubers kind of move too fast to really tell. I think your gonna have to wait on that. I wouldn't be surprised by some balancing but I don't expect them to be massive. I did see that the Mk2 -> Mk1 adapter has oxidizer now in one of the streams.

Changes like adding fuel will be alright as we can always empty them out! I've made a stupidly fast jet that's mostly SP+ parts, so I'm hoping the drag hasn't been increased too much and it remains stupidly fast!
@Majorjim, how do you make those great 2d images of your ships? Sorry for beeing out of topic.

@Majorjim, how do you make those great 2d images of your ships? Sorry for beeing out of topic.

probably with Kronal Vessel Viewer. Scott Manly did a spotlight on it last week.

I think they should mention him somewhere in the partdescription. Hell he's the original author of these outstanding parts, and he deserves it.

Porkjet Aerospace sounds cool, or maybe Porkjet Industrials.

@Majorjim, how do you make those great 2d images of your ships? Sorry for beeing out of topic.

Yup, with Kronal Vessel Viewer. Try it out its great!

Yup, with Kronal Vessel Viewer. Try it out its great!

OMG this mod is amazing! Just trying it for the first time now.

OMG this mod is amazing! Just trying it for the first time now.

Cool isn't it! GusTurbo brought it to my attention.
I just found it one day, and I was sad it had been abandoned. I started trying to bring attention to it, and it got picked up by bigorangemachine. Great plugin.
